title: Open Wounds
description: Lexi and Sloan are doing everything in their power to fight the demons of their past. They continue to build each other up while rebuilding Lexiâ€™s home. Their careers are taking off and they're settling into a nice life they've carved out for themselves. But the demons of the past are beginning to catch up to the present. And Lexi must decide between fight or flight. Can their relationship withstand the constant threat? Or will the damage be more than either of them can take? Find out in the follow-up to Scarred... Open Wounds: A Damaged Souls Novel.***Disclaimer*** This novel contains serious themes; i.e. domestic abuse and cutting.
author: Twyla Turner
